metadata.title: Encore un crime de Joseph Lebon, représentant du peuple : la veuve Lallart, demeurant à Arras, a la Convention nationale
metadata.creator: Lallart, Albertine
Lallart, Albertine
Vicogne, Amélie-Françoise-Josèphe Lallart, veuve, attributed name
Guffroy, A. B. J. (Armand Benoît Joseph), 1740-1800, publisher
France. Convention nationale
metadata.publisher: A Paris : De l'imprimerie de Guffroy, rue Honoré, no. 35, cour des ci-devant Capucins,
metadata.description: Erroneously attributed to Amélie-Françoise-Josephe Lallart Vicogne. Cf. Martin & Walter

Concerns the prosecution of the merchant Benoît-Louis-Joseph Lallart (de Berlette) of Arras. Cf. Lecesne, E. Arras sous la Révolution, v. 2, p. 198; Paris, A.-J. Histoire de Joseph Le Bon et des Tribunaux révolutionnaires d'Arras et de Cambrai , v. 1, p. 252
metadata.notes: Title page located on front cover. No copyright page found. No table-of-contents pages found. Worn, damaged and discolored pages and cover. Skewed text. Uneven binding.
